wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 257]]'' is published.
==March==
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 258]]'' is published.
==April==
* '''[[3 April|3]]''' - Actor [[Erik Bauersfeld]] dies.
* '''[[5 April|5]]''' - ''[[The Story of Kullervo]]'' is published in the USA.
* '''[[7 April|7]]''' - ''[[A Secret Vice (book)|A Secret Vice]]'', a extended edition of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s lecture, is published.
==May==
* '''[[31 May|31]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Movie Trilogy Coloring Book]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 259]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[9 June|9]]''' - ''[[The Return Of The Ring: Proceedings of the Tolkien Society Conference 2012]]'' is published.
* '''[[26 June|26]]''' - Scholar [[John Ellison]] dies.

==July==
* '''[[28 July|28]]''' - ''[[Leaf by Niggle]]'', is published in its own volume.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 260]]'' is published.

==August==
* '''[[11 August|11]]''' - Musician [[Glenn Yarbrough]] dies.

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - ''[[Songs of Sorrow and Hope|Songs of Sorrow and Hope: The Art of Jenny Dolfen]]'' is published.
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2017]]'' is published.
* '''[[3 September|3]]-[[4 September|4]]''' - [[Middle-earth Festival]] at [[Sarehole Mill]], [[Birmingham]].
* '''[[8 September|8]] - [[11 September|11]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2016]] at [http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antony's College].
* '''[[22 September|22]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit Facsimile First Edition]]'' is published.
* '''[[23 September|23]]''' - Actor [[William Johnson]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 261]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[19 October|19]]''' - The posthumous publication, ''[[Beren and Lúthien]]'', edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]], is announced for publication on [[4 May]] [[2017]].
==November==
* '''[[3 November|3]]''' - ''[[The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun]]'' is published.
* '''[[3 November|3]]''' - The Bodleian Library presented the Bodley Medal to [[Christopher Tolkien]], the Library's highest honour.
* '''[[24 November|24]]''' - ''[[Laughter in Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 262]]'' is published.

==December==
* '''[[1 December|1]]''' - ''[[A Well of Wonder|A Well of Wonder: C. S. Lewis, J. R. R. Tolkien, and The Inklings]]'' is published.
* '''[[6 December|6]]''' - Actor [[Peter Vaughan]] dies.
* '''[[19 December|19]]''' - [[Daybreak Game Company]] becomes the new publisher of [[The Lord of the Rings Online]].
